privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Carteron Industries, we place great importance on the protection of your personal data and your privacy.
privacy.section1_text:
We only collect information strictly necessary for the operation of the site and the management of your requests via our contact form (name, email address, message, etc.).
No data is transmitted to third parties without your consent.
privacy.section2_text:
Our site does not use cookies for tracking, advertising, or analytics purposes.
Only technical cookies, essential for the proper functioning of the site, may be used.
privacy.section3_text:
The information you provide to us via the contact form is used solely to respond to your requests.
It is neither sold nor used for commercial purposes.
privacy.section4_text: We implement all necessary measures to ensure the security of your data.
privacy.section5_text: In accordance with current regulations, you have the right to access, rectify, and delete your personal data. To exercise these rights, contact us at the following address: ton-email@domaine.com
privacy.section6_text: This privacy policy may be modified at any time. We invite you to consult it regularly.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions about our innovative solutions for modern agriculture and our engineering services.

faq1.q: What technological solutions does Carteron Industries offer?
faq1.a: Carteron Industries offers a complete range of innovative technological solutions for modern agriculture. Our solutions include intelligent automation systems, IoT sensors for crop monitoring, farm management software, and precision equipment for resource optimization. We also develop tailor-made solutions to meet the specific needs of each farm.

faq2.q: How can I benefit from Carteron Industries' engineering services?
faq2.a: Our engineering services help you optimize your agricultural processes through a personalized approach. We analyze your farm, identify areas for improvement, and design tailor-made solutions. Our engineers support you from design to implementation, ensuring perfect integration and comprehensive training for your teams to maximize the benefits of our solutions.

faq3.q: Does Carteron Industries provide maintenance support for its solutions?
faq3.a: Yes, Carteron Industries provides comprehensive maintenance support for all its solutions. Our technical team is available 24/7 to ensure your equipment runs smoothly. We offer preventive maintenance contracts, emergency interventions, and regular software updates to guarantee the optimal performance of your installations.

faq4.q: Can Carteron Industries customize solutions to my specific needs?
faq4.a: Absolutely! Customization is at the heart of our approach. Each farm has its own specificities, and we adapt our solutions accordingly. Our engineers work closely with you to understand your needs, analyze your work environment, and develop solutions perfectly suited to your context and production objectives.
